name: The Panda Predicament
description:
Hello there!

Are you interested in playing as a lovely panda cub trying to survive in a ruthless environment? 
If so, this is the game for you!

You play as a smol panda boi who's been left all alone and thus he needs to venture into the unknown in order to find food and water. 
However, the other animals in the forest seem to have a grudge against you...

The game was created in a week-long game jam on the theme of "Extinction". This is a very early build and still needs a lot of polish. We would love to hear your feedback so we could make it as good as possible in the future.
